## GENERIC ARTIFACTS
agot_hammer_2 = {
	default = {
		default = { head = "council_marshal" torso = "council_marshal" }

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_hunchbacked = {
			animation = { head = "council_marshal" torso = "council_marshal" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 110
					has_trait = hunchbacked
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_bobbyhammer
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_infant = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 1
				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_1 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 4

				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_2 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 10

				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_basic = {
			animation = { head = "council_marshal" torso = "council_marshal" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 40
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_bobbyhammer
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_fat = {
			animation = { head = "council_marshal" torso = "council_marshalFat" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight > 40
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_bobbyhammer
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "council_marshal" torso = "council_marshalFatDwarf" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 50
						has_trait = dwarf
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_bobbyhammer
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_fat_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "council_marshal" torso = "council_marshalFatDwarf" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100

					}
				}
			}

			}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_pregnant = {
			animation = { head = "council_marshal" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassiveFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

agot_dornish_spear_2 = { # wields spear
	default = {
		default = { head = "celebrateTwoHanded1_entry" torso = "celebrateTwoHanded1_entry" }

		celebrate_two_handed_artifact_spear_basic = {
			animation = { head = "celebrateTwoHanded1_entry" torso = "celebrateTwoHanded1_entry" }

			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = artifact_dornish_spear_equipped_prop
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}
	}

	boy = male
	female = male
	girl = male
}
agot_dornish_spear_3 = { # wields two handed spear
	default = {
		default = { head = "twoHandedAggressive1_entry" torso = "twoHandedAggressive1_entry" }

		two_handed_aggressive_spear_basic = {
			animation = { head = "twoHandedAggressive1_entry" torso = "twoHandedAggressive1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						scope:current_weight < 50
						NOT = { portrait_has_trait_trigger = { TRAIT = dwarf } }
						NOT = { portrait_has_trait_trigger = { TRAIT = pregnant } }

					}
				}
			}

			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = artifact_dornish_spear_equipped_prop
				animations = AI_vengeful_decal
			}
		}

		two_handed_aggressive_spear_fat = {
			animation = { head = "twoHandedAggressive1_entry" torso = "twoHandedAggressiveFat1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						scope:current_weight > 50
						NOT = { portrait_has_trait_trigger = { TRAIT = dwarf } }
						NOT = { portrait_has_trait_trigger = { TRAIT = pregnant } }

					}
				}
			}


			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = artifact_dornish_spear_equipped_prop
				animations = AI_vengeful_decal
			}
		}

		two_handed_aggressive_spear_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "twoHandedAggressive1_entry" torso = "twoHandedAggressiveFat1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						scope:current_weight < 50
						portrait_has_trait_trigger = { TRAIT = dwarf }
						NOT = { portrait_has_trait_trigger = { TRAIT = pregnant } }
					}
				}
			}


			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = artifact_dornish_spear_equipped_prop
				animations = AI_vengeful_decal
			}
		}

		two_handed_aggressive_spear_fat_dwarf = {

			weight = {
				base = 0

					AND = {
						scope:current_weight > 50

				}
			}

			weight = {
				base = 0

					AND = {

					}
				}
			}

			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = artifact_dornish_spear_equipped_prop
				animations = AI_vengeful_decal
			}
		}

		two_handed_aggressive_spear_pregnant_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "twoHandedAggressive1_entry" torso = "twoHandedAggressiveFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

						has_trait = pregnant
						has_trait = dwarf
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_darktalon
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}
	}
}

				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_nightfall
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_pregnant_fat_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "oneHandedAggressive1_entry" torso = "oneHandedAggressive1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight > 60
						has_trait = pregnant
						has_trait = dwarf
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_nightfall
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}
	}
}
agot_nightfall_4 = {
	default = {
		default = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_kingsguard1_entry" }

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_hunchbacked = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_kingsguard1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 110
					has_trait = hunchbacked
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_nightfall
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_infant = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 1
				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_1 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 4

				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_2 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 10

				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_basic = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_kingsguard1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 40
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_nightfall
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_fat = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_kingsguardFat1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight > 40
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_nightfall
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_kingsguardFat1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 50
						has_trait = dwarf
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_nightfall
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_fat_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_kingsguardFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight > 50
						has_trait = dwarf
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_nightfall
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_pregnant = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_kingsguardFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 45
						has_trait = pregnant

					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_nightfall
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_pregnant_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_kingsguardFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 60

				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {

agot_pride_1 = {
	default = {
		default = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_hunchbacked = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 110
					has_trait = hunchbacked
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_pride
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_infant = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 1
				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_1 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 4

				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_2 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 10

				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_basic = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 40
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_pride
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_fat = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassiveFat1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight > 40
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_pride
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassiveFat1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 50
						has_trait = dwarf
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_pride
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_fat_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassiveFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight > 50
						has_trait = dwarf
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_pride
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_pregnant = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassiveFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100

					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_pride
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_pregnant_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassiveFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 60

					}
				}
			}

			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_skullcleaver
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_pregnant_fat_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_kingsguardFatDwarf2_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight > 60
						has_trait = pregnant
						has_trait = dwarf
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_skullcleaver
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}
	}
}

agot_stalwart_1 = {
	default = {
		default = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_hunchbacked = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 110
					has_trait = hunchbacked
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_stalwart
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_infant = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 1
				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_1 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 4

				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_2 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 10

				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_basic = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 40
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_stalwart
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight > 40
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_stalwart
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 45
						has_trait = pregnant
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_stalwart
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_pregnant_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_kingsguardFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 60
						has_trait = pregnant
						has_trait = dwarf
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_stalwart
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_pregnant_fat_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_kingsguardFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight > 60
						has_trait = pregnant
						has_trait = dwarf
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_stalwart
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}
	}
}

agot_supremacy_1 = {
	default = {
		default = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_hunchbacked = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 110
					has_trait = hunchbacked
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_supremacy
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_infant = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 1
				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_1 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 4

				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_2 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 10

				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_basic = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 40
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_supremacy
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_fat = {

					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight > 40
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_supremacy
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassiveFat1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 50
						has_trait = dwarf
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_supremacy

			}

agot_dragonglass_sword_1 = {
	default = {
		default = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_basic = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 40
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_dragonglass_sword_prop
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

agot_dragonglass_sword_2 = {
	default = {
	default = { head = "council_marshal" torso = "council_marshal" }

	council_marshal = {
			animation = { head = "council_marshal" torso = "council_marshal" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						#scope:age >= 10
						scope:current_weight < 65
						NOT = { portrait_has_trait_trigger = { TRAIT = dwarf } }
					}
				}
			}

			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_dragonglass_sword_prop

			}

#Forgables

agot_black_death_1 = {
	default = {
		default = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_hunchbacked = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 110
					has_trait = hunchbacked
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_black_death
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_infant = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 1
				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_1 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 4

				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_2 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 10

				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_basic = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 40
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_black_death
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_fat = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassiveFat1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight > 40
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_black_death
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassiveFat1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 50
						has_trait = dwarf
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_black_death
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_fat_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassiveFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight > 50
						has_trait = dwarf
						NOT = { has_trait = pregnant }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_black_death
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_pregnant = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassiveFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 45
						has_trait = pregnant
						NOT = { has_trait = dwarf }
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_black_death
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_pregnant_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassiveFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight < 60
						has_trait = pregnant
						has_trait = dwarf
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_black_death
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_pregnant_fat_dwarf = {
			animation = { head = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassive1_entry" torso = "throneRoom_oneHandedPassiveFatDwarf1_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					AND = {
						current_weight > 60
						has_trait = pregnant
						has_trait = dwarf
					}
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_black_death
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}
	}
}
agot_black_death_2 = {
	default = {
		default = { head = "council_marshal" torso = "council_marshal" }

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_hunchbacked = {
			animation = { head = "council_marshal" torso = "council_marshal" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 110
					has_trait = hunchbacked
				}
			}
			portrait_modifier = {
				animations_props = agot_artifact_weapon_black_death
				animations = council_marshal_decal
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_infant = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 1
				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_1 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 4

				}
			}
		}

		throneRoom_one_handed_passive_1_child_2 = {
			animation = { head = "idle_entry" torso = "idle_entry" }

			weight = {
				base = 0

				modifier = {
					add = 100
					age <= 10

				}
